The hotel is located in the bustling Wukesong business district and is a unique theme hotel. The design style of the hotel is based on orange. From the lobby to the guest rooms, orange elements are everywhere, giving people a warm and homely feeling.

In general, Orange Hotel (Beijing Wukesong Branch) is a warm and comfortable hotel, and the details are full of surprises. Whether you are traveling for business or leisure, this is a good choice. I give this hotel a high score of 4.8 stars and highly recommend it to everyone.

comments.translatedContent: The hotel is not good, the sound insulation is terrible, and the service attitude is also very rude

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, first of all, thank you for your stay. We feel deeply guilty after reading your review. We are really sorry that we could not bring you a high-quality stay experience. Our hotel rooms all use double-layer soundproof glass and sound insulation system. Designed by the Tsinghua Institute of Acoustics to ensure a quiet sleep. For guests with higher sleep environment requirements, we prepare earplugs, steam eye masks and other sleep aids at the front desk. The friends waiting by your side will also receive your feedback as soon as possible. , we will change your room to a room that meets your requirements at any time; all hotel employees have gone through one-on-one pre-job training and can only work independently after passing the assessment. After asking the colleagues on duty at the front desk that day, according to your order specifications, on the day of check-in We reserve the whole night for you. We will provide you with free cancellation service for any reason within 15 minutes of check-in. You checked in at around 23:00 on the same day and asked for a refund of the room fee to leave at about 1:30 in the morning. Because you The exemption cancellation time of 15 minutes after check-in has passed. The front desk staff on duty do not have the authority to refund the room fee you paid. We cannot meet your requirements in time. We would like to express our apologies. We attach great importance to your feedback and will take it with you. We are contacting you sincerely to solve the problem. We want to express our apology and do not mean to disturb you. However, we still caused you a misunderstanding. We still hope that you can give us a chance to communicate and resolve the misunderstanding. Looking forward to your reply, I wish you all the best!

comments.translatedContent: The hotel front desk and the cleaning lady were both very nice. They also helped me move to a more central location. I asked for an extra quilt and it was delivered quickly. Although it is next to the road, it is very quiet and the sound insulation effect is very good. The room is small, but it is located in Beijing after all. It is also very close to the subway station. It is very convenient to go to the Forbidden City. The light in the room is yellow, so it may be dark if you are working, but it is fine if you are not working.

We will serve everyone well with our heart. A family friend, looking forward to seeing you next time! I wish you a happy life! Hotel Manager: Zhao Dan

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the room attendants and room hygiene. We are very happy to bring you a good stay experience. The hotel strictly abides by the Huazhu Group's room cleaning procedures. We will continue to work hard to provide every guest with a comfortable and secure stay. All hotel staff look forward to your next visit and wish you a happy life. Manager: Ji Hongjiao

comments.translatedContent: The facilities are old and dusty. I have stayed in several Orange Crystal and Orange hotels, but this one is the worst, and the decoration is not matching. Very poor experience!

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and giving us the opportunity to serve you. The hotel is located in the Badelli Automobile Park near Haidian Wuluju Station on Metro Line 6. Parking is convenient. All rooms in the hotel are Bright and large windows with a wide view. Compared with the recently opened Orange Hotel, there is indeed a certain gap in the decoration style of the hotel, but we have gradually updated and improved it. Last year, we updated the entire hotel lobby area and added a new lobby business area. The area provides free Internet printing services for guests in need. There is also a snack and coffee area. During leisure time in the afternoon, you can have a cup of fragrant freshly ground coffee and warm tea to bring you comfort and relaxation. There is a laundry room on the first floor of the hotel for in-house guests. 24-hour free self-service laundry service. We have recently updated the curtains, lamps, toiletries and brand-new bedding in the room. A comfortable stay experience is our unchanging goal and we are constantly working hard to achieve this. Your feedback on the dust on the floor of the room The problem, after our on-site inspection, is that the joints between the hotel floors cannot be cleaned normally. In response to this problem, we have conducted special cleaning training for the room attendants, which will bring you a bad experience. We deeply We apologize. If you have any questions during your stay, you can contact the front desk at any time. We will always be by your side. We also sincerely hope that we can do better under the supervision of guests who care about our development like you. We hope that we will do better in the future. You will be able to see our efforts and progress when you check in again. We look forward to your visit every time. We also hope that we can do better under your supervision. I wish you a happy New Year in advance. Manager: Zhang Minghui

I have to go to bed after so long. In short, the cleanliness is okay, and the rest is fine.

comments.translatedContent: The hotel is very old and the facilities are very basic. The hotel opened in 2008 but it says it opened in 18 years. It was very uncomfortable to stay there.

feedbackList.translateContent: Dear guest, first of all, thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Since the hotel facilities failed to bring you a satisfactory stay experience, we would like to express our sincere apologies. In order to improve the overall environment of the hotel, we We are always following up. During the epidemic last year, we replaced all the original mattresses with zero-pressure mattresses. The split air conditioners and curtains in the room were all updated. This year, we added a business office area and a self-service laundry room on another floor. We are always working hard for the comfort of your stay. We once again express our apologies for bringing you a not so good experience. Thank you for your feedback. If you have any questions during your stay, you can contact our staff at any time. We will be by your side 24 hours a day and wish you a happy holiday! !

comments.translatedContent: The price is high, the sanitation of the room is poor, and there is no soundproofing

feedbackList.translateContent: Hello dear guest! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and giving feedback. We apologize for not giving you a satisfactory check-in experience. The hotel room will fluctuate within a certain range according to the surrounding traffic. We sincerely contact you to confirm the itinerary Afterwards, you can choose online channels to book as soon as possible. The room sanitation problems you feedback have been followed up with the room management staff as soon as you read your comments. We will strengthen the cleaning process training, refine the supervision links, and strive to improve the details Sanitation, to provide you with a more comfortable living environment. The problem of sound insulation in the room has always been a problem for us. Due to the special geographical location of the hotel, the rooms are designed with double-layer soundproof glass at the beginning of the design. We also prepare for you at the front desk. If you have any needs during the store, you can contact our staff at any time. We will always be by your side and express our apologies again. I hope you can give us another chance to correct our mistakes. All the staff in the hotel The staff looks forward to seeing our changes when you check in again, and wish you a happy holiday!
